page.title: 14SHOPS
page.content: There are many shops in Keyham. There are food shops, an off licence, post office, second-hand shops, woolshops, newsagents, fish and chip shops and many more. Nearly all the streets have at least one shop. I live in Saltash Road, which is a busy main road through Keyham. It has 12 shops including a chemists and an insurance brokers. Most of the shopkeepers are very kind but the shops do vary a lot. Every week I buy a Dandy comic from Fleet News in Fleet Street. One of the other newsagents sells food as well, but we don't go there because there are lots of flies. Most of the local shop prices are quite reasonable but sometimes we go to a big supermarket further away if we are doing a lot of shopping, because we can save quite a bit of money.There are quite a few hairdressers and takeaway food shops.
